LanguageData.CommandDeployWormholePortalB_PilotDesc: Deploy a wormhole at a specified point and form a passage connecting two points.A guide is required to go to unexplored areas.
LanguageData.NotEnoughFuel: Lack of nutrients necessary for development
LanguageData.WormholeNotLinked: This mine type has not yet developed a wormhole
LanguageData.WormholeLinkLost: The end of the wormhole expanded by this mine type has been destroyed.
LanguageData.WormholePortalLinked: The expansion of the mine shaft type has been completed! This allows you to quickly move from the head to the map with the end.
LanguageData.WormholePortalB_Destroyed: The end of the wormhole where the mine shaft type expanded has been destroyed.
